<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcBitWidth == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExtBits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> - SrcBitWidth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  KnownBits Result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Result.One = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a> &lt;&lt; ExtBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Result.Zero = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a> &lt;&lt; ExtBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Result.One.ashrInPlace(ExtBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Result.Zero.ashrInPlace(ExtBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a2ed221e7e8b34742e248f6f81ef15f90"><span class="doxyHighlight">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a2ed221e7e8b34742e248f6f81ef15f90">KnownBits::makeGE</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Val)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Count the number of leading bit positions where our underlying value is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// known to be less than or equal to Val.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a> | Val).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8d92de57590536d2f254fe5e903e3372">countl&#95;one</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each of those bit positions, if Val has a 1 in that bit then our</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// underlying value must also have a 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> MaskedVal(Val);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a5120eaa394627e6c1ec3d66ef77947cd"><span class="doxyHighlight">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a5120eaa394627e6c1ec3d66ef77947cd">KnownBits::umax</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we can prove that LHS &gt;= RHS then use LHS as the result. Likewise for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RHS. Ideally our caller would already have spotted these cases and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimized away the umax operation, but we handle them here for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// completeness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.getMinValue().uge(RHS.getMaxValue()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RHS.getMinValue().uge(LHS.getMaxValue()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RHS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the result of the umax is LHS then it must be greater than or equal to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the minimum possible value of RHS. Likewise for RHS. Any known bits that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are common to these two values are also known in the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  KnownBits L = LHS.makeGE(RHS.getMinValue());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  KnownBits R = RHS.makeGE(LHS.getMinValue());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> L.intersectWith(R);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift both arguments from the signed range to the unsigned range, e.g. from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;-0x80, 0x7F&#93; to &#91;0, 0xFF&#93;. This allows us to use &quot;sub nuw&quot; below just like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// abdu does.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that we can&#39;t just use &quot;sub nsw&quot; instead because abds has signed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inputs but an unsigned result, which makes the overflow conditions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SignBitPosition = LHS.getBitWidth() - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Arg : &#123;&amp;LHS, &amp;RHS&#125;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Tmp = Arg-&gt;Zero&#91;SignBitPosition&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Arg-&gt;Zero.setBitVal(SignBitPosition, Arg-&gt;One&#91;SignBitPosition&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Arg-&gt;One.setBitVal(SignBitPosition, Tmp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the common bits between (sub nuw LHS, RHS) and (sub nuw RHS, LHS).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  KnownBits Diff0 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Add=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;NSW=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, LHS, RHS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  KnownBits Diff1 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Add=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;NSW=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, RHS, LHS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Diff0.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a76e45a40f2f0b5b09132d1de119765e8">intersectWith</a>(Diff1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278" lineLink="#aa18696894909136556d40020664aefe1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aa18696894909136556d40020664aefe1">getMaxShiftAmount</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;MaxValue, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxValue.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a29177946d0b9d5003e7a952a9684b797">extractBitsAsZExtValue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f">Log2&#95;32</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>), 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is only an approximate upper bound.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxValue.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab01d8694a759a934e01f1c558c3ce862">getLimitedValue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ae9ffa8b50ca6095202b2e8e7686c10b8"><span class="doxyHighlight">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ae9ffa8b50ca6095202b2e8e7686c10b8">KnownBits::shl</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;RHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NUW,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NSW, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShAmtNonZero) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = LHS.getBitWidth();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftByConst = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftAmt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    KnownBits Known;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftedOutZero, ShiftedOutOne;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a> = LHS.Zero.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a97419fdddc400a50c7c40ef5c35903cd">ushl&#95;ov</a>(ShiftAmt, ShiftedOutZero);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ade8e20ecea1091e835395746448e262e">setLowBits</a>(ShiftAmt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a> = LHS.One.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a97419fdddc400a50c7c40ef5c35903cd">ushl&#95;ov</a>(ShiftAmt, ShiftedOutOne);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All cases returning poison have been handled by MaxShiftAmount already.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NSW) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NUW &amp;&amp; ShiftAmt != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NUW means we can assume anything shifted out was a zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ShiftedOutZero = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftedOutZero)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a192e15f89a5aa04df018639812e2c4db">makeNonNegative</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftedOutOne)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a36d9168813b2a8415c085ac551c54458">makeNegative</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Known;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fast path for a common case when LHS is completely unknown.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  KnownBits Known(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MinShiftAmount = RHS.getMinValue().getLimitedValue(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MinShiftAmount == 0 &amp;&amp; ShAmtNonZero)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MinShiftAmount = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.isUnknown()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ade8e20ecea1091e835395746448e262e">setLowBits</a>(MinShiftAmount);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NUW &amp;&amp; NSW &amp;&amp; MinShiftAmount != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a192e15f89a5aa04df018639812e2c4db">makeNonNegative</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Known;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine maximum shift amount, taking NUW/NSW flags into account.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> MaxValue = RHS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a331d69b5f93e47e7c596062b77dd5913">getMaxValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxShiftAmount = <a href="#aa18696894909136556d40020664aefe1">getMaxShiftAmount</a>(MaxValue, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NUW &amp;&amp; NSW)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxShiftAmount = std::min(MaxShiftAmount, LHS.countMaxLeadingZeros() - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NUW)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxShiftAmount = std::min(MaxShiftAmount, LHS.countMaxLeadingZeros());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NSW)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxShiftAmount = std::min(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MaxShiftAmount,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::max(LHS.countMaxLeadingZeros(), LHS.countMaxLeadingOnes()) - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fast path for common case where the shift amount is unknown.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MinShiftAmount == 0 &amp;&amp; MaxShiftAmount == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> - 1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ade8e20ecea1091e835395746448e262e">setLowBits</a>(LHS.countMinTrailingZeros());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.isAllOnes())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a4f1e1a4449b58958c5884c689e7f4861">setSignBit</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NSW) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a192e15f89a5aa04df018639812e2c4db">makeNonNegative</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.isNegative())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a36d9168813b2a8415c085ac551c54458">makeNegative</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Known;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the common bits from all possible shifts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftAmtZeroMask = RHS.Zero.zextOrTrunc(32).getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftAmtOneMask = RHS.One.zextOrTrunc(32).getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab6fff8a97bcb55e50e9be0ecf0c99b63">setAllBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab6fff8a97bcb55e50e9be0ecf0c99b63">setAllBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftAmt = MinShiftAmount; ShiftAmt &lt;= MaxShiftAmount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">       ++ShiftAmt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip if the shift amount is impossible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((ShiftAmtZeroMask &amp; ShiftAmt) != 0 ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (ShiftAmtOneMask | ShiftAmt) != ShiftAmt)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known = Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a76e45a40f2f0b5b09132d1de119765e8">intersectWith</a>(ShiftByConst(LHS, ShiftAmt));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a28cf355963391ab8781b2347d495553d">isUnknown</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All shift amounts may result in poison.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a44875c6f48f6c843cf3114a19280b5ca">hasConflict</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac9384ac452485cfed65a93b238080793"><span class="doxyHighlight">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac9384ac452485cfed65a93b238080793">KnownBits::abs</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IntMinIsPoison)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the source&#39;s MSB is zero then we know the rest of the bits already.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a157efd68e8b4b838829cad165b1583f8">isNonNegative</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Absolute value preserves trailing zero count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">  KnownBits KnownAbs(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the input is negative, then abs(x) == -x.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aabc0af41b4437080b27002ed7a1ed656">isNegative</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">    KnownBits Tmp = &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Special case for IntMinIsPoison. We know the sign bit is set and we know</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all the rest of the bits except one to be zero. Since we have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IntMinIsPoison, that final bit MUST be a one, as otherwise the input is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// INT&#95;MIN.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IntMinIsPoison &amp;&amp; (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.popcount() + 2) == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a33f9f862dca8ee0f23bff5941bf433d8">setBit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a1eeff70353694cb360b2893553c18e7d">countMinTrailingZeros</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">    KnownAbs = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Add&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, IntMinIsPoison, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a066220c7a472d8793de64a0ad23487d2">KnownBits::makeConstant</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>(), 0)), Tmp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One more special case for IntMinIsPoison. If we don&#39;t know any ones other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than the signbit, we know for certain that all the unknowns can&#39;t be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zero. So if we know high zero bits, but have unknown low bits, we know</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for certain those high-zero bits will end up as one. This is because,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the low bits can&#39;t be all zeros, so the 1 in (~x + 1) cannot carry up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the high bits. If we know a known INT&#95;MIN input skip this. The result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is poison anyways.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IntMinIsPoison &amp;&amp; Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ad2ecbbccee1ca4e3ddde24cc714ec79e">countMinPopulation</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4676f4bc7da9235ff3b6683dd670d7be">countMaxPopulation</a>() != 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af883359d8cdce0f853270b28d7bfc564">clearSignBit</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a4f1e1a4449b58958c5884c689e7f4861">setSignBit</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">      KnownAbs.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#acb95d5d8e87df053e1b53e2ec60de4b6">setBits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>() - Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a7f47812e8e75b0616a97d7004e5fb909">countMinLeadingZeros</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>() - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> flipSignBit(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a724958d37dfb62b07a6e3649f8375469">avgFloorU</a>(flipSignBit(LHS), flipSignBit(RHS)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a33a2235df9c9a82feea834f0955c2a4a">avgComputeU</a>(LHS, RHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;IsCeil=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#afac275f11600acd55aade8c6aaf9276e"><span class="doxyHighlight">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#afac275f11600acd55aade8c6aaf9276e">KnownBits::avgCeilS</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> flipSignBit(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ab7ed19a0340f28b453449cbcf090cd5b">avgCeilU</a>(flipSignBit(LHS), flipSignBit(RHS)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ab7ed19a0340f28b453449cbcf090cd5b"><span class="doxyHighlight">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ab7ed19a0340f28b453449cbcf090cd5b">KnownBits::avgCeilU</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a33a2235df9c9a82feea834f0955c2a4a">avgComputeU</a>(LHS, RHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;IsCeil=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#abd85d08f35600dd19615a1efe9cacb1d"><span class="doxyHighlight">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#abd85d08f35600dd19615a1efe9cacb1d">KnownBits::mul</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;RHS,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NoUndefSelfMultiply) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = LHS.getBitWidth();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> == RHS.getBitWidth() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Operand mismatch&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!NoUndefSelfMultiply || LHS == RHS) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Self multiplication knownbits mismatch&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the high known-0 bits by multiplying the unsigned max of each side.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conservatively, M active bits &#42; N active bits results in M + N bits in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result. But if we know a value is a power-of-2 for example, then this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// computes one more leading zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: This could be generalized to number of sign bits (negative numbers).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> UMaxLHS = LHS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a331d69b5f93e47e7c596062b77dd5913">getMaxValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> UMaxRHS = RHS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a331d69b5f93e47e7c596062b77dd5913">getMaxValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For leading zeros in the result to be valid, the unsigned max product must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fit in the bitwidth (it must not overflow).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasOverflow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> UMaxResult = UMaxLHS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a028f4d1eead63cc33499ce3459bd27c7">umul&#95;ov</a>(UMaxRHS, HasOverflow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LeadZ = HasOverflow ? 0 : UMaxResult.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8bad27827f46bca6baf814cbd2b64e84">countl&#95;zero</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The result of the bottom bits of an integer multiply can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inferred by looking at the bottom bits of both operands and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiplying them together.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can infer at least the minimum number of known trailing bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of both operands. Depending on number of trailing zeros, we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// infer more bits, because (a&#42;b) &lt;=&gt; ((a/m) &#42; (b/n)) &#42; (m&#42;n) assuming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a and b are divisible by m and n respectively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We then calculate how many of those bits are inferrable and set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the output. For example, the i8 mul:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  a = XXXX1100 (12)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  b = XXXX1110 (14)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We know the bottom 3 bits are zero since the first can be divided by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 4 and the second by 2, thus having ((12/4) &#42; (14/2)) &#42; (2&#42;4).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Applying the multiplication to the trimmed arguments gets:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    XX11 (3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    X111 (7)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    XX11</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   XX11</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  XX11</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// XX11</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// XXXXX01</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Which allows us to infer the 2 LSBs. Since we&#39;re multiplying the result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by 8, the bottom 3 bits will be 0, so we can infer a total of 5 bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The proof for this can be described as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pre: (C1 &gt;= 0) &amp;&amp; (C1 &lt; (1 &lt;&lt; C5)) &amp;&amp; (C2 &gt;= 0) &amp;&amp; (C2 &lt; (1 &lt;&lt; C6)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      (C7 == (1 &lt;&lt; (umin(countTrailingZeros(C1), C5) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    umin(countTrailingZeros(C2), C6) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    umin(C5 - umin(countTrailingZeros(C1), C5),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                         C6 - umin(countTrailingZeros(C2), C6)))) - 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %aa = shl i8 %a, C5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %bb = shl i8 %b, C6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %aaa = or i8 %aa, C1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %bbb = or i8 %bb, C2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %mul = mul i8 %aaa, %bbb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %mask = and i8 %mul, C7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %mask = i8 ((C1&#42;C2)&amp;C7)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Where C5, C6 describe the known bits of %a, %b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// C1, C2 describe the known bottom bits of %a, %b.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// C7 describes the mask of the known bits of the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Bottom0 = LHS.One;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Bottom1 = RHS.One;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// How many times we&#39;d be able to divide each argument by 2 (shr by 1).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This gives us the number of trailing zeros on the multiplication result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrailBitsKnown0 = (LHS.Zero | LHS.One).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a239abca11deebf2731206dd41cf43c0e">countr&#95;one</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrailBitsKnown1 = (RHS.Zero | RHS.One).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a239abca11deebf2731206dd41cf43c0e">countr&#95;one</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrailZero0 = LHS.countMinTrailingZeros();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrailZero1 = RHS.countMinTrailingZeros();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrailZ = TrailZero0 + TrailZero1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Figure out the fewest known-bits operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmallestOperand =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::min(TrailBitsKnown0 - TrailZero0, TrailBitsKnown1 - TrailZero1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResultBitsKnown = std::min(SmallestOperand + TrailZ, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> BottomKnown =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Bottom0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0fa9845f80fa0642b31c238f4ab0d5ef">getLoBits</a>(TrailBitsKnown0) &#42; Bottom1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0fa9845f80fa0642b31c238f4ab0d5ef">getLoBits</a>(TrailBitsKnown1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">  KnownBits Res(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Res.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a2780c5606880394d3f07cd2079a27697">setHighBits</a>(LeadZ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Res.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a> |= (~BottomKnown).getLoBits(ResultBitsKnown);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Res.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a> = BottomKnown.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0fa9845f80fa0642b31c238f4ab0d5ef">getLoBits</a>(ResultBitsKnown);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re self-multiplying then bit&#91;1&#93; is guaranteed to be zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NoUndefSelfMultiply &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Res.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>&#91;1&#93; == 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Self-multiplication failed Quadratic Reciprocity!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Res.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a33f9f862dca8ee0f23bff5941bf433d8">setBit</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Exact)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Known;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If LHS is Odd, the result is Odd no matter what.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Odd / Odd -&gt; Odd</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Odd / Even -&gt; Impossible (because its exact division)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>.One&#91;0&#93;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a33f9f862dca8ee0f23bff5941bf433d8">setBit</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MinTZ =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (int)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>.countMinTrailingZeros() - (int)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.countMaxTrailingZeros();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxTZ =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (int)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>.countMaxTrailingZeros() - (int)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.countMinTrailingZeros();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MinTZ &gt;= 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Result has at least MinTZ trailing zeros.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ade8e20ecea1091e835395746448e262e">setLowBits</a>(MinTZ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MinTZ == MaxTZ) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Result has exactly MinTZ trailing zeros.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a33f9f862dca8ee0f23bff5941bf433d8">setBit</a>(MinTZ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxTZ &lt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Poison Result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4816b869391aac5bbcce9c889c2ecd97">setAllZero</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the KnownBits exhaustive tests, we have poison inputs for exact values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a LOT. If we have a conflict, just return all zeros.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a44875c6f48f6c843cf3114a19280b5ca">hasConflict</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4816b869391aac5bbcce9c889c2ecd97">setAllZero</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Known;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9f4c03962b079bed0cd6c59256844bb5"><span class="doxyHighlight">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9f4c03962b079bed0cd6c59256844bb5">KnownBits::sdiv</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;RHS,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Exact) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Equivalent of &#96;udiv&#96;. We must have caught this before it was folded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.isNonNegative() &amp;&amp; RHS.isNonNegative())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a96120d4062fabb503b1b92401e54d14f">udiv</a>(LHS, RHS, Exact);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = LHS.getBitWidth();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  KnownBits Known(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.isZero() || RHS.isZero()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Result is either known Zero or UB. Return Zero either way.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Checking this earlier saves us a lot of special cases later on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4816b869391aac5bbcce9c889c2ecd97">setAllZero</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// INT&#95;MIN/-1 would be a poison result (impossible). Estimate the division</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a2838364c4863a3b2c55c6fd7052413aa"><span class="doxyHighlight">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a2838364c4863a3b2c55c6fd7052413aa">KnownBits::urem</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a> |= HighBits;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the result is less than or equal to either operand, any leading</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zero bits in either operand must also exist in the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t Leaders =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::max(LHS.countMinLeadingZeros(), RHS.countMinLeadingZeros());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a2780c5606880394d3f07cd2079a27697">setHighBits</a>(Leaders);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Known;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a905d2324c26b7a6f5aeb929a734ce0bc"><span class="doxyHighlight">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a905d2324c26b7a6f5aeb929a734ce0bc">KnownBits::srem</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KnownBits &amp;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  KnownBits Known = remGetLowBits(LHS, RHS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RHS.isConstant() &amp;&amp; RHS.getConstant().isPowerOf2()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NB: Low bits are set in &#96;remGetLowBits&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> LowBits = RHS.getConstant() - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the first operand is non-negative or has all low bits zero, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the upper bits are all zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.isNonNegative() || LowBits.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#acfae9bdee6027ffa8ffe244cc22e3a76">isSubsetOf</a>(LHS.Zero))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a> |= ~LowBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the first operand is negative and not all low bits are zero, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the upper bits are all one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.isNegative() &amp;&amp; LowBits.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a6da514c588b2668280a861a59bfc9fa5">intersects</a>(LHS.One))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a> |= ~LowBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Known;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The sign bit is the LHS&#39;s sign bit, except when the result of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remainder is zero. The magnitude of the result should be less than or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// equal to the magnitude of either operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.isNegative() &amp;&amp; Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a5d774365f4d1120b030d026860193a02">isNonZero</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a2780c5606880394d3f07cd2079a27697">setHighBits</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::max(LHS.countMinLeadingOnes(), RHS.countMinSignBits()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.isNonNegative())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a2780c5606880394d3f07cd2079a27697">setHighBits</a>(</span></CodeLine>
